text: Yes! I totally forgot about that dang dog from duck hunt taunting me until I saw this! :joy:

A little sad boi song — but man — such a good version.

<https://open.spotify.com/track/01ExORA3SC8YyMroa0tLaW>

Late to the party, but love this topic. If you’re into lo-fi and NES, I’ve been listenting to playlists like this lately: <https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4tFV60Dy8LfcIQw9XrVoCD?si=b93cf77abc114c46>

And my vote for best NES track, although there’s some stiff competition :point_up_2::skin-tone-3: is Mega Man Bubble Theme. <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FEULEvmq7yE> @ :32 is :fire: Mega Man had a lot of good music IMO.
what i am hearing is we need a developer NES game night :slightly_smiling_face:
i’ll bring my Pi with all the Roms
<@UB690RZA7> a man of taste, I see
